'''Charla Nichols''' is a girl scout who was part of the Brown Birds selling cookies to people, along with [[Sarah Tuttle]]. She appeared  in "[[The One Where Rachel Quits]]", portrayed by [[Kyla Pratt]].

During the scene where the Troop leader sees who has sold the most cookies, Charla acts really rudely to [[Ross Geller|Ross]] for breaking Sarah's leg, even though it was an accident and calls him a scrud (which is not even a word). She was revealed to have sold 278 boxes of cookies, much less than Ross had.
